comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Argentine battleship, built in Quincy, Massachusetts, launched in 1911. Shown here in two Bain/LOC photos, moored at Quincy for additional touches, on Dec. 2, 1912:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2448661177/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2448661525/in/photostream/]

Two Bain/LOC photos show the Rividavia being refurbished in dry dock at Charlestown, Mass., in 1913:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3931067681/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3931067333/]
